EmailTemplate.description: Office Depot and Purell team up to fight germs!
EmailTemplate.name: Professional Purell sku spiff
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot and Purell team up to fight germs!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Send a Signal That You Care with the Purell Solution
The PURELL brand shows people you care about cleanliness, health and well-being. Now the brand that created hand sanitizer introduces a complete solution, including hand soap and surface disinfection products to more holistically fight the spread of germs. All scientifically formulated for no-trade-off protection. So you never have to choose between products that are effective and products people feel great about using.
